publicPrompts.title: Public Prompts Library
publicPrompts.description: Discover and use prompts shared by the community
publicPrompts.searchPlaceholder: Search prompts by title, content, or tags...
publicPrompts.adjustSearch: Try adjusting your search terms or category/filter.

tour_intro: Let's take a quick tour to show you how to use AskHole effectively.
tour_sidebar: This is your main navigation hub. Here you can access all your chats, create and manage prompts, and explore the public library.
tour_sidebar_history_tab: View and search all your previous chat conversations. Click on any chat to continue where you left off.
tour_sidebar_prompts_tab: Create, save, and organize your custom prompt templates. Perfect for frequently used questions or tasks.
tour_sidebar_public_tab: Explore prompt templates shared by the community. Find inspiration and discover new use cases.
tour_mobile_sidebar: Tap this menu button to open the sidebar and access your chats, prompts, and settings.
tour_new_chat: Tap this button to start a new chat conversation.
tour_message_input: Type your messages here and press Enter or click send. You can also attach files and toggle image generation mode.
tour_model_selector: Select the AI model you want to use for this conversation. Different models have different capabilities and costs.
tour_message_list: Your conversation appears here. You can copy messages, delete them, or add them to your prompt library.
tour_complete_message: You can restart this tour anytime by clicking the help button in the sidebar. Happy chatting!
